jobDescription: A 19-year old innovator who loves to code
aboutText: I am Aarnav Sanghvi, a 19-year-old innovator who loves to code. I am a Software Engineer with a diverse skillset, having worked with NextJS, TailwindCSS and C#. I am passionate about coding, and I have been honing my skills in this field since I was a young age. I also have a wide range of hobbies that I actively pursue, such as skiing, hiking, reading, and water-polo. These activities give me the opportunity to stay up-to-date with the latest technologies and trends in the tech industry, which I use to ensure that my work is of a high standard. With my knowledge and experience, I am confident that I can develop and implement solutions that are both innovative and effective.
